summary: This is a prisoner schedule report from the Brooklyn Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) dated August 9, 2019. It lists two prisoners, Jonathan M. Espinal and Henry M. Rodriguez, detailing their scheduled movements, security warnings, and associated individuals with whom they must be kept separate.

events.title: Prisoner Movements Scheduled
events.description: Jonathan M. Espinal is scheduled for hospital transport, and Henry M. Rodriguez is scheduled for sentencing at 40 Foley (likely a courthouse).

events.title: Take Out Order Issued for Espinal
events.description: A 'Take Out Order' from an AUSA (Assistant United States Attorney) was issued for Jonathan M. Espinal, effective through December 31, 2019.

events.title: Take Order Issued for Rodriguez
events.description: A 'Take Order' from the MCC (Metropolitan Correctional Center) was issued for Henry M. Rodriguez, effective through the conclusion of trial.

locations: 40 FOLEY (likely the Daniel Patrick Moynihan United States Courthouse at 500 Pearl Street, Manhattan)
keyFacts: This document is a prisoner schedule report from the Brooklyn Metropolitan Detention Center dated August 9, 2019.
It details the scheduled movements of two prisoners, Jonathan M. Espinal (for hospital transport) and Henry M. Rodriguez (for sentencing).
Both prisoners have the offense code '3599 Dangerous' listed, and extensive lists of other inmates they must be kept separate from for security reasons.
The document references legal orders: a 'Take Out Order' from an AUSA for Espinal and a 'Take Order' from the MCC for Rodriguez.
None of the individuals listed in this document appear to be directly related to the Epstein case; it appears to be a routine prison administrative record.
